Items.Title: Oversight - TLC: The Status of the Yellow Cab Industry.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - TLC: The Status of the Yellow Cab Industry.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring taxis and for-hire vehicles to display a decal warning passengers to look for cyclists when opening the door
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring taxis and for-hire vehicles to display a decal warning passengers to look for cyclists when opening the door.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to extending scheduled vehicle retirement dates for taxicabs during the COVID-19 state disaster emergency and the repeal thereof
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extending scheduled vehicle retirement dates for taxicabs during the COVID-19 state disaster emergency and the repeal thereof.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring a study on increasing the use of electric for-hire vehicles and installing new charging infrastructure, and to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to annual reports on increasing the use of electric for-hire vehicles and installing new charging infrastructure
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Study on increasing the use of electric for-hire vehicles and installing new charging infrastructure, and in relation to annual reports on increasing the use of electric for-hire vehicles and installing new charging infrastructure.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the amount of personal injury insurance coverage that the taxi and limousine commission may require for licensed vehicles
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Limiting the amount of personal injury insurance coverage that the taxi and limousine commission may require for licensed vehicles.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the New York State Governor to sign, legislation that would create a surcharge for for-hire vehicles (FHVs) that would go towards funding the expansion of wheelchair accessible and all-electric FHVs.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Create a surcharge for for-hire vehicles (FHVs) that would go towards funding the expansion of wheelchair accessible and all-electric FHVs.
